maqras.text: læw rea di hewiyng khea khun bn thi long rim fang nı sphaph thi pwy
læa rea di hı mi tnmi (phanthu mi leuxy) natea ngxkngey khun pkkhlum taw khea
læa rea di sng khea pi yang (hmuban khxng khea) mi canwn hnung sæn khn hrux kein kwa nan
læw phwk khea k sraththa dangnan rea cung plxy hı phwk khea mi khwam sukh saray chaw raya wela hnung
dangnan (muhammad) cng tham phwk khea si wa phracea khxng cea mi butr hying hlay khn læa phwk khea mi butr chay hlay khn kranan hrux
hrux wa rea di srang ma la xik ahˌ pen phes hying doythi phwk khea ruhen pen phyan
phung thrab theid thæcring phwk khea nan neuxngcak kar klaw thec khxng phwk khea phwk khea cung klaw wa
xallxhˌ thrng hı kaneid butr chay! Læa thæcring phwk khea nan pen phu klaw thec xyang nænxn
xallxhˌ thrng leuxk butr hying thæn butr chay kranan hrux
keid xari khun kæ phwk cea! Thami phwk cea cung tadsin chen nan
phwk cea midi khırkhrwy du bang hrux
hrux wa phwk cea mi hlakthan xan chad cæng
dangnan phwk cea cng na khamphir khxng phwk cea ma sædng hak phwk cea pen phu saty cring

læa phwk khea klaw xang khwam samphanth (thang kherux yati) rahwang phraxngkh kab phwk yin læa doy næ nx nph wk yi nru di wa thæcring phwk man ca thuk na taw ma prakt txhna xallxhˌ (pheux kar lngthosʹ)
mha brisuththi ying dæ xallxhˌ cak sing thi phwk khea klaw xang
wentæ pwng baw khx ngxallxhˌ phu suxsaty
nænxn phwk cea læa sing thi phwk cea khearph bucha nan
Phwk cea mi samarth thahı phu dı hlng thang pi di
nxkcak phu thi ca kheapi xyu nı fi xan luk chotichwng
læa mimi phu dı nı hmu phwk rea wentæ khea di mi tahænng thi di kahnd wi læw
læa thæcring rea nan pen phu thi yun khea thæw xyu læw
læa thæcring rea nan pen phu sæsxng sdudi xallxhˌ
læa phwk khea hela nan (kuffa rmak kahˌ) khey klaw wi wa
hakwa rea mi khx takteuxn (khamphir) xyu kab rea chen deiyw kab hmu chn nı smay kxn «
nænxn rea k ca pen baw khx ngxallxhˌ phu suxsaty
tæ phwk khea ptiseth mi sraththa tx xalkurxan læw phwk khea k ca di ruhen
læa doy nænxn likhit khxng rea di banthuk wi kxn læw kæ pwng baw khxng rea thi pen rx sul
wa nænxn phwk khea ca di rab khwam chwyhelux
læa thæcring phirphl khxng rea nan sahrab phwk khea ca pen phu mi chaychna
dangnan cea cng hanhe xxk cak phwk khea (chn kuffar) chaw raya hnung
læa cng feakhxy du phwk khea theid læw phwk khea k ca hen man xeng
phwk khea rengrib tx kar lngthosʹ khxng rea kranan hrux
khran meux kar lngthosʹ di lng ma thi hna banphak khxng phwk khea yam chea khxng brrda phu thuk takteuxn nan man chang chawcha seiy ni krari
læa cea cng hanhe xxk cak phwk khea raya hnung
læa cng feakhxy dutheid læw phwk khea k ca hen man xeng
mha brisuththi ying dæ phracea khxng cea phracea hæng xanac cak sing thi phwk khea klaw xang
santi cng mi dæ brrda rx sul thanghlay
læa brrda kar srrseriy thangmwl pen khx ngxallxhˌ phracea hæng sakl lok
sxd khx sa ban dwy xal ku rxa nthi pen kheruxng teuxnsti
tæwa brrda phu ptiseth sraththa xyu nı kar hying phyxng læa kar tækyæk
ki stwrrsʹ ma læw thi rea di thalay prachachati kxn phwk khea læw phwk khea di rxng reiyk khx khwam chwyhelux thang «thi mimi wela xik læw sahrab thang rxd
læa phwk khea prahlad cı thi mi phu takteuxn cak hmu phwk khea mayang phwk khea læa phwk ptiseth sraththa di klaw wa ni khux mayakr nak kohk taw chkac
Khea di thahı phracea hlay xngkh pen phracea xngkh deiyw kranan hrux? Thæcring ni pen reuxng prahlad cring «
læa phwk hawhna khxng phwk khea pha kan xxk pi (phlang klaw wa) cng kawhna tx pi læa xdthn nı kar yud man tx brrda phracea khxng phwk than tx pi! Thæcring pen reuxng thi thuk wangphæn wi læw
rea mi khey diyin reuxng ni ma kxn nı sasna sudthay ni michı xun dı nxkcak penkar seksrr pan tæng khun ma theanan

di mi khx takteuxn (xalkurxan) thuk prathan lng ma kæ khea thæn phwk rea kranan hrux? Hamidi phwk khea xyu nı kar sngsay cak khx takteuxn khxng kha! Mi pheiyng tæ theanan phwk khea yang midi lim rs kar lngthosʹ khxng kha
hrux wa n thi phwk khea mi khum khlang hæng khwam metta khxng phracea khxng cea phuthrng xanac phuthrng prathan hı xyang makmay
hrux wa xanac hæng chan fa thanghlay læa phændin læa thi xyu rahwang thang sxng pen khxng phwk khea dangnan cng hı phwk khea khun pi ha sahetu kan theid
(phwk khea) pen phirphl cak næwrwm tang «ca phay thæ hni telid pi nı mi cha ni
kxn hna phwk khea hmu chn khxng nuh læa xad læa fir xea n ceakhxng sea hmud di ptiseth ma læw
læa sʹamud læa hmu chn khxng lut læa chaw pathub chn hela ni pen næwrwm
mimi khn hnung khn dı (nı phwk khea) wentæ ptiseth brrda rx sul dangnan kar lngthosʹ khxng kha cung hemaasm (kæ phwk khea)
læa phwk khea hela nan midi khxy xan dı nxkcak seiyng kampnath pheiyng khrang deiyw doy mimi kar chakcha
læa phwk khea klaw wa kha tæ phracea khxng rea khx thrng pord reng swn khxng rea hı kæ rea doy rew theid kxn thi ca thung wan hæng kar chara baychi
cea (muhammad) cng xdthn tx sing thi phwk khea klaw læa cng raluk thung baw khxng rea dawu d phuthrng phlang (nı kar ptibati sasn kic) thæcring khea pen phu phin hna khea ha xallxh semx
thæcring rea di thahı phukhea sæsxng sdudi phrxm kab khea thang nı yam phlbkha læa yam rungxrun
Læa (rea di thahı) nk ma rwm kan thanghmd cheuxfang khea
læa rea di thahı xanacakr khxng khea khemkhæng læa rea di hı khwam kheacı thi thuk txng kæ khea læa kar tadsin chikhad nı reuxng tang «
